title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 344/1999 of 16 February 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 1439/95 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3013/89 as regards the import and export of products in the sheepmeat and goatmeat sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 344/1999 of 16 February 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 1439/95 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3013/89 as regards the import and export of products in the sheepmeat and goatmeat sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EC) No 1439/95 is hereby amended as follows:
1. Article 12(2) is replaced by the following:
'2. The list may be revised by the Commission where any issuing authority is no longer recognised, where it fails to fulfil any of the obligations incumbent on it or where a new issuing authority is designated.`;
2. in Annex I, 'Department of Primary Industries and Energy` is replaced by 'Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 February 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 February 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 312, 20. 11. 1998, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 143, 27. 6. 1995, p. 7.
(3) OJ L 223, 11. 8. 1998, p. 4.
